meanings.definition: To surpass in rivalry or competition.
meanings.sent1: In the race, Sarah outrivalled all her competitors.
meanings.sent2: The champion outrivalled his opponents with ease.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outrivalled the other animals in the nut-gathering contest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outrivalled any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sun outrivalled all the stars in brightness that night.

meanings.definition: To be superior to in rivalry or competition.
meanings.sent1: The new company quickly outrivalled the old one in sales.
meanings.sent2: His skills outrivalled those of his teammates on the field.
meanings.sent3: The cat outrivalled the dog in the game of chase.
meanings.sent4: Her intelligence outrivalled that of her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh bread outrivalled all other scents in the bakery.
